thread.title: I am busier now than when I was the Kotoko coach Didi Dramani
thread.title_full: I am busier now than when I was the Kotoko coach Didi Dramani

title: I am busier now than when I was the Kotoko coach Didi Dramani
text:
12:10 CET “I am busier now than when I was the Kotoko coach” – Didi Dramani - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Mas-ud Didi Dramani has insisted that he is busier now than when he was the head coach of Kumasi Asante Kotoko. 
The former Kotoko manager is on record to have said that he had difficulty in sleeping because of his duties with the club as well as working for the Confederations of African Football. 
Many Kotoko fans as well his admirers felt the gaffer will have time for his family after fallen out with the reds. 
But the CAF Technical Instructor has exclusively disclosed that the task is mightier than kit was when he was with Kotoko. 
Speaking to Ghanasoccernet.com on his current schedule, Didi said 'The task is mightier than many people think. I sleep less now. It was better when I was with Kotoko'. 
'I am busier now than when I was with Kotoko. Now it is all about designing programs and policies and the table is always full with books. Compared to my time at Kotoko, I was very free when working for Kotoko.' 
Didi Dramani won the MTN FA Cup Best Coach in 2014 as well as the Best Coach of the league the same year but successor David Duncan could not defend both titles, placing sixth with the team. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
